Column Name: insurance_percent: 0.03 (3%) - Insurance as percentage of vehicle value
freight_value_per_tonne: 120.00 - Average revenue or value per tonne of freight (AUD)
driver_cost_hourly: 35.00 - Average driver cost including on-costs (AUD per hour)
avg_loadunload_time: 1.00 - Average loading/unloading time per trip (hours)
